title: Happy BirthGray To You 9/15: Kyrie Irving, The Bodyguard, Pope Francis, 'Peg the Patriarchy', Celebrity Birthdays, Inspiration 4
itunes:title: Happy BirthGray To You 9/15: Kyrie Irving, The Bodyguard, Pope Francis, 'Peg the Patriarchy', Celebrity Birthdays, Inspiration 4
description:
In this edition of Happy BirthGray To You, Jack and Miles discuss Kyrie Irving's antics, the upcoming remake of 'The Bodyguard', Pope Francis questioning vaccine skeptics, what 'Peg the Patriarchy' actually means, the birth of Miles Gray (and Jenna Marbles and Prince Harry), and the Space X 'Inspiration 4' mission.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
